title: Factor
text: To find the x-intercepts for the equation, factor into two binomial factors.

title: Finding Factors
text: To factor, find two integers that multiply to $$6$$ and add to $$-5$$.

title: X-intercepts
text: The x-intercepts of a graph are found when the graph crosses the x-axis at $$y=0$$.

title: Zero Product Property
text: For two factors multiplied to be equal to zero, one or the other must also be equal to zero.
